backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing access control initialization, admin management, user profiles, and contact form/ticket handling.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module that upgrades old state to include an empty adminIds set.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for documentation or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including color variables, theming, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root mount element and script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring together layout sections and admin gate context.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI component showing different messages and actions for unauthenticated or unauthorized admin access.
frontend/src/components/AdminOrderManage: Admin dashboard handling orders, admin checks, initialization flows, and sub-sections for tracking, quotes, and admin principal management.
frontend/src/components/AdminOrderTracki: Admin interface for searching tracking codes and updating package arrival, restoration steps, and shipping status.
frontend/src/components/AdminPasswordPro: Modal prompting for an admin password and unlocking the admin panel upon correct entry.
frontend/src/components/AdminPrincipalMa: Admin tool to add new admin principals and display the current list of authorized principals.
frontend/src/components/AdminQuoteFormsS: Displays submitted quote tickets and allows admins to toggle each ticket’s completion status.
frontend/src/components/ContactFormSecti: Customer quote request form that validates input, submits data, and shows a success message.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with background image, marketing text, and buttons to scroll to contact and tracking sections.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with error handling and UI state for authentication.
frontend/src/components/ServiceTiersSect: Renders three service tier cards with features and a scroll action for contacting the service.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and admin access handling.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a sticky header with navigation, mobile menu, admin link behavior, and the login button.
frontend/src/components/TrackPackageSect: Provides a tracking form that fetches package status, displays progress, and shows status badges.
frontend/src/context/AdminGateContext.ts: Defines context for admin access gating with unlock prompts and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Creates an admin-capable backend actor using the authenticated identity without secret initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAllowlistQuer: Exposes queries and mutations for reading and modifying the admin allowlist using the admin actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Provides a React Query hook to fetch admin initialization status from the admin actor.
Contains React Query hooks for creating orders, updating order status, listing all orders, checking admin status, and initializing access control.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTicketQueries: Defines hooks to list all admin tickets and update their completion status with proper error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTrackingManag: Provides admin tracking management hooks for fetching tracking state and performing actions like marking arrival, adding steps, and completing steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for login, identity management, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes a mutation hook to submit contact form data through the actor and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackingQueries.ts: Provides a mutation hook to fetch both tracking state and order status for a package with combined error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, typography, and utility classes including a logo container.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Utility to generate base-path-aware asset URLs respecting Vite’s BASE_URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatusLabel.ts: Maps OrderStatus enum values to human-readable status labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, existing features, and pending requests related to multi-admin access control and Internet Identity.
